code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Title(data){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__head--title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:data})});}export default function Model(_ref){var data=_ref.data,id=_ref.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__head--model",children:data.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(id,"/").concat(item.name),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"container__head--list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[item.nb_place," Places"]})]},item.index)});})});}export function Modelprez(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container__prez",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__prez--image",children:"image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__prez--text",children:"text"})]});}export function Features(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__feat",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container__feat--list",children:"liste des caract\xE9ristiques"})});}
